name: 余琬琴
objective: 本課程將探討下列主題: 細胞結構,胺基酸與蛋白質,蛋白質的結構,蛋白質的功能, 酵素,　　碳水化合物, 核酸, 基因工程簡介
schedule:
1.　　Introduction
2.　　The Foundations of Biochemistry
3.　　Water
4.　　Amino Acids, Peptides, and Proteins (part 1)
5.　　Amino Acids, Peptides, and Proteins (part 2)
6.　　Exam 1
7.　　The Three-Dimensional Structure of Proteins (part 1)
8.　　The Three-Dimensional Structure of Proteins (part 2)
9.　　Protein Function (part 1)
10.　　Protein Function (part 2)
11.　　Enzymes (part 1)
12.　　Enzymes (part 2)
13.　　Exam 2
14.　　Carbohydrates and Glycobiology
15.　　Nucleotides and Nucleic Acids
16.　　DNA-Based Information Technologies (part 1)
17.　　DNA-Based Information Technologies (part 2)
18.　　Exam 3
materials: Lehninger Principle of Biochemistry by Nelson and Cox
